Author: ecuzzillo
Content: You CAN do it procedurally; in fact, you can do it in Brainfuck, since Brainfuck is Turing-complete. The point is, macros let you stop repetitively writing the same boilerplate code, and let you get down to the point.

Author: kingkongrevenge
Content: None of these examples demonstrate something that can't be done procedurally.  He never actually answers the question "What is the point of macros?"

Author: kingkongrevenge
